iati-activity.title: HR Capacity Gaps in the Water Sector
iati-activity.description: The strategic objective of this research is to provide much needed data, for use by senior decision makers, on the human resources (HR) capacity shortages and gap in the drinking water, sanitation and hygiene promotion sub-sectors. These HR gaps and shortages are widely recognized as one of the main constraints to progress in achieving the Millennium Development Goal (MDG) targets for the sector and for sustaining progress to achieve universal access to safe drinking water and adequate sanitation beyond 2015. Conducting national case studies is intended to help countries identify the HR capacity gaps and shortages they face in the sector and to assist them in planning to address their capacity constraints in the short, medium and long term.
